## About Section

**Short description**: SIMD-accelerated similarity scoring for vector search and RAG

**Full description**: 
SIMD-accelerated MaxSim (ColBERT/ColPali), cosine similarity, diversity selection (MMR/DPP), token-level alignment/highlighting, and Matryoshka refinement for vector search and RAG pipelines. Supports both text-only (ColBERT) and multimodal (ColPali) late interaction retrieval with token-level interpretability and snippet extraction capabilities.
